name: Its just a Mood Disorder
description:
Its just a Mood Disorder... 

**Based on me**

this is a simple text and click story game.. it starts off edgy depicting that the character is struggling with his mood disorder....

**Scroll down to click after some texts**

It was made within 25 minutes.. it is a project im working on and will eventually add graphics and make the story line expand largely in multiple directions.. basing on my life.. so hopefully this story will keep getting updated untill i reach happiness eventually..
